#summary Hex viewer component

= Introduction =

ATBinhex is a component that can display files in Unicode (UTF-16LE), Hexadecimal, Binary and Ansi modes. It's originally developed by Alexey Torgashin. The Delphi package can be found [http://atorg.net.ru/delphi/atbinhex.htm here]

= Features =

The LCL port has almost all features of the [http://atorg.net.ru/delphi/atbinhex.htm Delphi] version except by:

 * All: 
   * Does not has support for Regular Expressions search
   * Does not has file notification support
 * GTK only
   * Selection is disabled by default due to being slow in some situations (HEX and Unicode modes under gtk2) and crash in others (Unicode mode under gtk1). 
     * To enable it define !EnableSelection in ATBinHexOptions.inc file

= Documentation =

You can use the documentation that comes with the Delphi package considering the above remarks

= Requirements =

 * Lazarus 0.9.26 or a recent svn
 * [LCLExtensions] package
